parameters.name: nodes
parameters.description: Optionally specify on which nodes to run and how many instances you want on each node.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The type of node handler, one of SingleNode, SomeNodes, AllNodes (leave empty for local execution)

parameters.name: nodes
parameters.description: The nodes to use for this node handler type

parameters.name: instances
parameters.description: The amount of instances per node of this handler type

parameters.name: api_endpoint
parameters.description: The API endpoint to send analytics data to.

parameters.name: page_regex
parameters.description: The regular expression the referrer has to contain to be served the following block of captures.

parameters.name: captures
parameters.description: List of captures for the matched pages.

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: An identifier for this capture. Will default to the selector.

parameters.name: xpath
parameters.description: Use XPath selection if true, or CSS selection otherwise.

parameters.name: selector
parameters.description: XPath or CSS selector, depending on XPath value above.
